name: Viking Saga: New World
description: Travel to the far lands of the west! Visit wondrous corners of the ancient world! Meet new interesting characters and learn their intriguing stories! Find a cure and save your kingdom!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: Pentium III 800MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM Storage: 170 MB available space
